puzzle.hint: Did you notice that it is a PIG PEN cipher?
The first word decodes cleanly, but there's something about the rest that isn't quite right.
Have you tried reorienting the symbols?
Have you tried reorienting the symbols by using the time?
Orient your paper so that the top of the page faces an analog clock's hour hand (90 degrees right for 3:00, 90 degrees left for 9:00, upside-down for 6:00, etc.)
The message says: Prison break on Tuesday meet at Columbia River Brewing
